title: The History of Global Banking: A Broken System?
description: The 2008 Global Financial crisis was kicked off by major structural issues in the global banking system and exacerbated by record levels of household debt.  Today the world is on the brink of yet another major financial downturn, and yet again household debts are at record levels.
dc:creator: Economics Explained
